Name: ParkourMan
About the game: Become a real master of the free city run with ParkourMan! If you choose the life in motion, here goes the time to change into the little man and challenge yourself. Perform fantastic tricks and stunts, overcome the obstacles, climb high buildings and never stop moving. Collect coins and special boosters which will help you to be faster, stronger and even more enduring. Beware of too high houses and deep holes â€“ you may fall down! Explore different city views and locations, unlock amazing skins for your character and power its characteristics up. Upgrade your reaction, make good decisions fast and without hesitation, and conquer this parkour world! Features: Parkour simulator Endless forward movement Randomly generated obstacles and tracks Bright and colorful graphics Interesting boosters as the way to power yourself up Train your reaction! Enjoy the freedom in motion with ParkourMan!
